This project provides comprehensive instructions and examples for creating agents in Azure AI Foundry as part of the Generative AI Bootcamp. The repository includes detailed setup guides, step-by-step agent creation instructions, advanced features documentation, best practices, troubleshooting guides, and working examples including an FAQ bot.
